result.ga: An dtiocfadh leat glaoch a chur ar Bhríd
result.orig: An dtiocfadh leat glaoch a chur ar Bhríd
result.html: An dtiocfadh leat glaoch a chur ar BhrídCould you call Bríd?
result.ponchtml: An dtiocfaḋ leat glaoċ a ċur ar ḂrídCould you call Bríd?

result.eng: I was going to phone you.
result.ga: Bhí mé chun glaoch a chur ort
result.orig: Bhí mé chun glaoch a chur ort
result.html: Bhí mé chun glaoch a chur ortI was going to phone you.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé ċun glaoċ a ċur ortI was going to phone you.

result.ga: Cuirfidh mé glaoch ar na Gardaí
result.orig: Cuirfidh mé glaoch ar na Gardaí
result.html: Cuirfidh mé glaoch ar na GardaíI'll call the police.
result.ponchtml: Cuirfiḋ mé glaoċ ar na GardaíI'll call the police.

result.html: Cuirfidh mé glaoch ortI'll call you.
result.ponchtml: Cuirfiḋ mé glaoċ ortI'll call you.

result.eng: I got a call from the journalist.
result.html: Fuair mé glaoch ón iriseoirI got a call from the journalist.
result.ponchtml: Fuair mé glaoċ ón iriseoirI got a call from the journalist.

result.ga: Rinne mé dearmad glaoch a chur ort
result.orig: Rinne mé dearmad glaoch a chur ort
result.html: Rinne mé dearmad glaoch a chur ortI forgot to call you.
result.ponchtml: Rinne mé dearmad glaoċ a ċur ortI forgot to call you.

result.eng: I will phone you tonight, Bairbre. What is your phone number?
result.ga: Cuirfidh mé glaoch ort anocht a Bhairbre Cén uimhir fóin atá agat
result.orig: Cuirfidh mé glaoch ort anocht a Bhairbre Cén uimhir fóin atá agat
result.html: Cuirfidh mé glaoch ort anocht a Bhairbre Cén uimhir fóin atá agatI will phone you tonight, Bairbre. What is your phone number?
result.ponchtml: Cuirfiḋ mé glaoċ ort anoċt a Ḃairbre Cén uiṁir fóin atá agatI will phone you tonight, Bairbre. What is your phone number?
